official_title: Congratulating Jones Metropolitan High School of Business and Commerce, on the 50th anniversary of its establishment.

summary.text: Congratulates the principal, faculty, staff, graduates, and students of Jones Metropolitan High School of Business and Commerce, in Chicago, on the 50th anniversary of the school's foundation.
